conversations.body_text: Hi Josep PC,  We will send HS Pro out this week. And the tracking number for the motors is JSELF0804240241YQ,   The shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS, you can track it via https://www.17track.net/en.

Hello!!

Here a brief review.
https://youtu.be/Sn0Pg2iL6nM?si=irM3zO-T8mPjDszB

Also on Meroni sim and racing channel.
I will make one on the HS shifter as soon it arrives!
Good stuff yours!!


Josep

El El lun, 22 dic 2025 a las 14:04, service@simsonn.com
